message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it will be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and benefits, I propose a price of $120 for this item.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. Considering my budget and the market value of this product, I'd be happy to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product and your previous offer, I propose a price of $110 for the item. This allows us to meet somewhere in the middle.
